player.name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
player.physicalDescription: 6'11" forward, impossibly long wingspan, athletic build, infectious smile, intense game face
player.archetype: Immigrant who became champion through relentless work and humble heart

figure.name: Ruth
figure.attributeDescription: sheaves of wheat from gleaning in the fields, symbol of her humble work
figure.visualStyle: Moabite woman, modest dress, hardworking appearance
figure.clothing: simple modest dress suitable for field work, head covering, practical sandals
figure.physicalDescription: young woman with determined eyes, strong from labor, humble bearing despite inner strength
figure.anatomyNote: two arms, often carrying grain or in gesture of devotion
figure.archetype: Foreigner who became royalty through loyalty and humble work

connection.thematic: Both left everything for a foreign land and earned their place through relentless work and loyalty
connection.narrative: From Athens street vendor to Milwaukee champion. From Moab widow to David's ancestor. Foreigners who became royalty.
connection.relationship: Immigrants whose loyalty and work ethic rewrote their destiny

interactions.description: Standing together as outsiders who earned their place
Both in their element - Giannis on court, Ruth in fields
Both celebrating their earned victories - trophy and family
